title: Whiskey vs. Vodka: Which Causes Worse Hangovers?
excerpt: Discover which alcohol gives the worst hangover in the ultimate showdown: whiskey vs vodka. Learn about congener content, why clear liquor causes fewer hangovers, and science-backed prevention tips.
metaDescription: Whiskey vs vodka hangover comparison. Learn which alcohol causes worse hangovers, the science of congeners in clear vs dark liquor, and proven hangover prevention strategies.
author: Sarah Mitchell, Certified Nutritionist

image.alt: Whiskey and vodka bottles side by side illustrating hangover comparison
